display.title: Soldering Alloy
description: &&aSoldering Alloy&&r is used solely as a &&9Fluid&&r, and in most cases is &&dinterchangeable&&r in circuit recipes as a cheaper alternative to Tin&&r.
The choice is yours. Save more materials? Make Soldering Alloy. Spend less time crafting materials? Tin is the way to go.

subtitle.text: I got soul but I'm not a solder
